Akkroo | London | ONSITE | VISA — https://akkroo.com

Akkroo helps businesses to create measurably better marketing and sales teams. Our mobile and web based solution manages the awkward challenges of collecting customer data at events.

We’re 3 years old, 15 people small, recently beyond $1M ARR (SaaS) and growing quickly. Our global customers include Airbnb, PayPal, Harrods, IBM, Wired and Mercedes-Benz.

I’m Andy, one of the co-founders, and right now we're hiring for PHP full stack developers, and front-end developer/designers:

https://akkroo.com/jobs

Our hiring process usually comprises a video or face-to-face chat and a role-specific task (which we’ll step through together).

Tip: if you’re used to working at an agency and would love to work on a product instead, we could be a great fit.

Got questions? Ask me! jobs+andy+hn@akkroo.com
